attributes.action: GIve both Henry Allingham and harry patch a state funeral
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Henry Allingham came to visit my school just over a year ago and he told us that the person who stayed alive longer would receive a state funeral, on this matter would it be possible to give henry allingham a state funeral because he served in both the 1st world war and also in the 2nd world war, and was an amazing figure and a role model to alot of people.

rejection.details: Henry Allingham will receive a public funeral with military honours.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
